summary:
A creative, enthusiastic and open mind. Communicative and social in my working relationships.
I have the energy, structural way of working and perseverance to turn strategy into results and am able to achieve changes in both organizations and people.

Always striving to make a team better and looking for ways to foster talent and entrepreneurship. 
I am proactive and customer oriented, will show initiative and a can do mentality.

Experienced senior manager with 20+ years experience in many aspects of IT (Workplace Services, Infrastructure, Development). A long track record in international collaboration with colleagues and external partners.

profile_positions.description:
Manager of the Logistics & Support teams within Workplace Services, member of the Workplace Service MT.

-All user hardware logistics and services for NL + UK based Rabobank employees and European branches. This included all of our hardware purchases (laptops, desktops, screens, peripherals), mobile phones & telephony, printing, and third party logistics vendors & contracts. We also created new solutions for employees who would join Rabobank: everything they need to get them started but also to get acquainted with Rabobank Foundation and what we strive for in growing a better world together.

-Business Intelligence for the Workplace Services; all of the required data to manage our workplace services assets (e.g. lifecycle management, missing process, trends, financial forecasting).

-Supporting the central and local Rabobank offices with IT Coordination services. This also included phasing out of the last ATM's from local offices, or closing of offices.

-Dealingroom support teams in both Utrecht and London. These teams provide on floor technical support and solutions for our Markets and Treasury.

-Implementation of a global Digital Experience performance solution, NexThink. This will provide us global insights in the performance of our workplace services. It will allow us to proactively address issues and spot trends, manage our services, measure customer feedback, ultimately resulting in more productive employees.

-Internal media studio to record internal video broadcasts and Teams Live events.

-In control of Finance, Audit, Security and Compliance topics for these departments
profile_positions.title: Senior Delivery Manager Logistics & Support

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for a number of teams (both in Utrecht as in London) that provide key Office 365 communication and collaboration services to the Rabobank organisation: e-mail, Skype, Teams, Onedrive, Sharepoint. All of which have proven key collaboration solutions in the Covid-19 situation.
The teams also provide contact center solutions to the internal organization (e.g. HR, Servicedesk), voice recording solutions for certified users and dealerboard solutions for the trading rooms.
Key deliverables:
•	Setup an organization of 51 staff that is able to build and support the new way of working for the Rabobank in this completely new technology
•	Implement a new DevOps way of working within the teams
•	Migrate our existing environments and (40.000+ users) towards the cloud
•	Deliver on key projects and initiatives that are part of our Workplace Services strategy.
•	Work together with and support the regions on global plans and projects in steering committees and monthly alignment sessions
•	Setup a Compliance and Security team for Office 365 as this has become very important for our data compliancy
•	Guide the teams and employees develop further with being in control, have a pro-active approach and more customer aligned.
•	Make a team out of previously different departments with the same focus on our key objectives
•	Invest in new talents with different backgrounds and nationalities to change the team dynamics
profile_positions.title: Delivery Manager Office 365

profile_positions.description:
Managed a number of departments on an ad interim basis. The departments consisted of approx. 70+ staff and supported the European workplace services (including the Netherlands). This covered areas like VDI, Active Directory, Voice & Telephony, Functional management, Applications, e-mail.

In this period we also starting with implementing the One Digital Workspace, the start of migrating Rabobank to the cloud for our office software. This meant a lot of changes for my teams in supporting and migrating to newer technologies and also to provide support to our user community. At the same time we needed to guarantee continuity on our business critical services.

My key focus in this area has been to setup a structure in the team to better support this transition. At the same time there was also a need to improve the financial control and management of key vendors.
Prepare the teams and staff for the reorganization that would start per 1st of January 2019.

o	Public cloud

o	Storage
o	Physical and virtual servers & hardware
•	Chair the global service committee with representatives from all regions (Europe, Asia-Pacific, North America, South America)

The challenge in this role focused on both integrating two technically separate worlds (Rabobank Netherlands and International) and also defining the future to provide newer services and capabilities to our key users (Systems, regions).
The integration aimed at a lower TCO and less complexity for the organization to maintain.
Responsible for the private cloud initiative. Main purpose was to provide newer (pilot) technologies to the organization: more software defined solutions and a quicker time to market for Systems.
